statements: SELECT * FROM WineVarieties WHERE origin = 'France';
SELECT variety_name, rating FROM WineVarieties WHERE acidity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM WineVarieties ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT variety_name, origin, sweetness_level FROM WineVarieties WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_varieties FROM WineVarieties;
SELECT * FROM WineVarieties WHERE origin='France';
SELECT variety_name, rating, origin FROM WineVarieties WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT variety_name, acidity_level FROM WineVarieties WHERE acidity_level='High' ORDER BY variety_name ASC;
SELECT variety_name, sweetness_level FROM WineVarieties WHERE origin='Italy' AND acidity_level='Medium';
SELECT id, variety_name, rating FROM WineVarieties WHERE rating < 3 AND (sweetness_level='Dry' OR acidity_level='Low') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WineVarieties;
SELECT variety_name, origin_country, vintage_year FROM WineVarieties WHERE origin_country = 'France';
SELECT wine_id, variety_name FROM WineVarieties WHERE vintage_year = 2010;
SELECT * FROM TastingNotes WHERE taster_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY tasting_date DESC;
SELECT wine_id, aroma_description, flavor_profiles FROM TastingNotes WHERE tasting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WineVarieties WHERE origin_country = 'Italy' ORDER BY vintage_year DESC
SELECT wine_id, variety_name, origin_country FROM WineVarieties WHERE vintage_year >= 2010 AND alcohol_content > 12.5
SELECT wine_id, variety_name, origin_country, vintage_year, alcohol_content FROM WineVarieties WHERE variety_name = 'Merlot'
SELECT wine_id, variety_name, origin_country, vintage_year FROM WineVarieties WHERE alcohol_content BETWEEN 12 AND 14 ORDER BY variety_name ASC
SELECT * FROM TastingNotes WHERE tasting_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY tasting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM wines
SELECT id, name, type, origin FROM wines
SELECT name, rating FROM wines WHERE rating > 4.5
SELECT * FROM tasting_notes ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions
SELECT * FROM wines
SELECT name, type, origin FROM wines WHERE type='Red'
SELECT id, name, rating FROM wines ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM tasting_notes WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT region_name, country, climate FROM regions
SELECT * FROM WineVarieties;
SELECT variety_name, grape_type FROM WineVarieties WHERE region='France' ORDER BY variety_name;
SELECT variety_name, vintage_year, region FROM WineVarieties WHERE grape_type='Red' ORDER BY vintage_year DESC;
SELECT note_id, tasting_date, aroma_notes FROM TastingNotes WHERE variety_id=3;
SELECT rating, reviewer FROM WineRatings WHERE rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC, reviewer;
SELECT * FROM WineVarieties;
SELECT variety_name, grape_type FROM WineVarieties WHERE region = 'Napa Valley';
SELECT variety_name, vintage_year FROM WineVarieties ORDER BY vintage_year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM WineVarieties;
SELECT rating, reviewer FROM WineRatings WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM wine_varieties;
SELECT name, color FROM wine_varieties ORDER BY color ASC;
SELECT id, name, region FROM wine_varieties WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wine_producers WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT name, country FROM wine_regions WHERE climate = 'Temperate';
SELECT * FROM wine_varieties;
SELECT id, name, color FROM wine_varieties ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, color FROM wine_varieties WHERE color='Red' AND region='France';
SELECT w.name AS Producer, r.name AS Region, r.country FROM wine_producers w JOIN wine_regions r ON w.region_id=r.id;
SELECT v.name AS Variety, n.note AS Note, n.rating AS Rating FROM tasting_notes n JOIN wine_varieties v ON n.variety_id=v.id ORDER BY n.rating DESC;
